communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all files, reports, background information, memos, directives, investigatory materials, communications and any other attachments and relevant materials regarding a search conducted by the FBI at Urbanizacion Rexville BF-11 Calle 34 Bayamon, Puerto Rico on May 1, 2023. Please include all materials in any tangential or cross-reference databases (active or defunct), in addition to those materials found in the Central Records System. This request is for records produced since January 1, 2020.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Carlos Berríos Polanco

communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: FOIL - Public Surety Bond Exceptions
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

All exceptions (defined as "the comptroller may, in his discretion, waive the requirement of procuring such official undertaking or bond") for public surety bonds issued by the NYS Comptroller, and those still valid if issued during previous years,  as defined in PBO Section 11-4, for the last 24 months. 

All documents and communications containing any discussion in regards to waiving the requirement for such bond for the past 24 months.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Douglas Lloyd
